objects.text:
4K Upscaling
Multiple Voice Assistant
Purcolor & HDR 10+
Q-Symphony Sound

product_details.name: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security
product_details.description:
Item Id: ITM8580C5C3990D8. Listing Id: LSTTVSGYWKBKGZZ7FKYGN28O7. Brand: SAMSUNG. Sub Title: UA43DUE76AKLXL. Stock: IN_STOCK. Delivery - delivery by: 25 Apr, Friday. Delivery - delivery type: FREE Delivery. Variants - TVSGYWKBERHVSKKB: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 125 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. Variants - TVSGYWKBJHNSRN9N: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 138 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. Variants - TVSGRNGZXD8QWSJJ: SAMSUNG Crystal Vision 4K iSmart with Voice Assistant 138 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with IOT Sensors for Light & Camera. Variants - TVSGRNGZGWNFGCZM: SAMSUNG Crystal Vision 4K iSmart with Voice Assistant 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with IOT Sensors for Light & Camera. Variants - TVSGYWKBKYZ6JFP3: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 163 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. Variants - TVSGRNGZ77Y3X2UH: SAMSUNG Crystal Vision 4K iSmart with Voice Assistant 163 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with IOT Sensors for Light & Camera. Variants - TVSGYWKBKGZZ7FKY: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. highlights: Supported Apps: Netflix, Youtube, JioHotStar, Prime Video, Operating System: Tizen, Resolution: Ultra HD (4K) 3840 x 2160 Pixels, Sound Output: 20, Refresh Rate: 50 Hz. Description:

The Samsung Crystal UHD Smart TV has an array of features for an exceptional theatre-like experience in the comfort of your home. You can see your favourite stars come to life on this TV, thanks to the PurColour featured in it. With a 4K upscaling feature, this TV allows you to watch all your favourite content in 4K resolution by upscaling lower-quality content. You can watch any content you want from different platforms, as this TV features unlimited options for you to choose from without taking additional subscriptions. The Crystal processor 4K delivers accurate colours so you can see the vibrant colours on this TV at maximum resolution and quality.

Warranty - Not Covered in Warranty: Parts and Labour Costs are Covered under Warranty Against Any Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship.. specifications - Warranty - Warranty Service Type: For any warranty related issues, please call the Customer Support - [1800 40 7267864][https://www.samsung.com/in/microsite/samsung-mall/contact-us/]. specifications - Installation & Demo - Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV. specifications - Note - : Samsung reserves the right to contact the customer through mail, sms or call for product feedback, related information on product usage on the contact information as provided by Flipkart.. offers: 5% Unlimited Cashback on Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card, Get additional ₹1500 off on Credit/Debit Card, UPI and EMI Transactions, 10% off up to ₹1,000 on all Axis Bank Credit Card (incl. migrated ones) EMI Txns of ₹7,490 and above, Get extra 7% off (price inclusive of cashback/coupon), No Cost EMI on your Flipkart Paylater EMI Transactions, No Cost EMIs on Debit and Credit Cards, 10% off on BOBCARD EMI Transactions, up to ₹1,500 on orders of ₹5,000 and above, No Cost EMI on Bajaj Finserv.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and modern design for a tech product promotion, set against a gradient blue background with soft decorative wave patterns and outlined rounded rectangles for structure. At the top left, the bold and futuristic heading (`heading`) is showcased prominently, followed by a vibrant, slightly smaller subheading (`subheading`). Below that, description text (`description`) lists key product features in a compact, readable format. The product image (`product_image`) is centrally positioned, clearly showcasing the TV and its screen content. At the bottom left, a bold price tag (`price`) stands out, paired with a green rounded call-to-action button (`cta_button`) containing white text (`cta_text`) encouraging users to shop.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #2D5387
- Bright Blue: #3369CC
- Light Blue Gray: #F0F4F8
- Leaf Green: #6BBC42
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, dynamic swirl of rich colors that reflect high-quality display capabilities. The color palette includes electric green (#00FFB3), deep blue (#1E1EFF), fiery orange (#FF5C1F), radiant purple (#A020F0), and classic black (#000000). These colors are masterfully blended in bold, sweeping brush-like strokes across the screen, creating a sense of depth and motion. The white text (#FFFFFF) stands out sharply against the multicolor background, enhancing readability and drawing attention to the product features. For an advertisement banner, use a combination of black or dark tones for contrast and vivid swirls of these highlighted colors for energy and appeal.
